divs: Sighting DetailsMy truck was facing south on Nooney St. Poplar Bluff Mo. On my way to work on Aug 9 at 5:28. As I reached for the door handle I looked up and thought to myself wow the moon is bright, definitely full. Entering the truck I thought to myself the moon should be close to new moon phase now. So I looked up through the windshield to confirm. Yes, that's the moon alright, and it's full. A couple of minutes later (approx. 4 blocks) as I turned on to Main St. I had an unobstructed view of a perfect crescent moon. I continued driving to work another mile or so then I thought, wait, if I see the crescent moon now what was the light I thought was the full moon? I thought... there was no sound, there was no movement. Strange, very strange.
Summary: thought I was looking at full moon. driving to work four blocks later in a diferent direction saw cresent moon?
trends: There has been one other sighting in Poplar Bluff
There were no other sightings in Poplar Bluff on or around August 9th 2013
